entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 18. POP 60%

entry.title: Thursday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon then increasing to 40 gusting to 60. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 21. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023
